title: using the client app, when try to use mic and play aloud are not working
body:
**Describe the bug**

When we use the client, the mic feature,e and read aloud, its not working

**To Reproduce**

Start the Eliza server with the corresponding .env file, then run the client and test the microphone, attempting to replicate the sound of the response.

**Expected behavior**

Before this works
